mismatches.label: Overview of SASB Standards
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This appears to be a document section or introductory heading rather than a thematic grouping of ESG disclosures. A Category should represent substantive ESG topics like 'Energy Management' or 'Emissions', not structural document elements like 'Overview'.

mismatches.label: Total production
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity represents a general operational/production metric, not an ESG disclosure metric. It lacks any environmental, social, or governance context that would qualify it as an ESG metric according to the type definition.

mismatches.label: Total Revenue from Electrical, Electronic and Related Technology Products
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This represents a general financial/business metric about product revenue, not an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosure metric. ESG metrics would relate to sustainability, environmental impact, social responsibility, or governance practices.

mismatches.label: Desktop Integer Speed Score per Watt
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity describes a technical performance metric for computer processors, not an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosure. It does not relate to sustainability, social responsibility, or governance reporting requirements.

mismatches.label: Desktop Floating Point Speed Score per Watt
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity describes a technical performance benchmark for computer processors, not an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosure metric. It lacks any connection to sustainability, social responsibility, or governance reporting requirements.

mismatches.label: Laptop Performance Qualification Score
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity describes a technical product performance benchmark for laptops, which is unrelated to ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosures. The Metric type specifically requires ESG-related quantitative or qualitative disclosures, not general product specifications.

mismatches.label: Laptop Battery Life Score
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity describes a product performance benchmark metric, not an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosure. The definition specifically requires ESG-related metrics or qualitative disclosures about sustainability, governance, or social responsibility matters.

Total volume of water consumed across all operations

properties.description: Percentage of production from owned facilities

Composite metric calculating total energy consumed and percentages of grid electricity and renewable energy from total energy consumption
properties.equation: Grid % = (Grid Electricity / Total Energy) × 100; Renewable % = (Renewable Energy / Total Energy) × 100

properties.description: Energy consumed that was supplied from grid electricity
Energy consumed that was renewable energy from sources replenished at a rate greater than or equal to their rate of depletion
Composite metric combining total water withdrawn and total water consumed with geographic analysis of percentage in regions with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress
input_variables: Percentage in High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress regions

properties.description: Analysis of all operations for water risks and identification of activities that withdraw and consume water in locations with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress

entities.label: Water Withdrawn in High Stress Locations (Percentage)

properties.description: Water withdrawn in locations with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress as a percentage of the total water withdrawn
Calculates the percentage of water withdrawn from high or extremely high baseline water stress locations relative to total water withdrawn
properties.equation: (Water withdrawn in high stress locations / Total water withdrawn) × 100
input_variables: Water withdrawn in high stress locations

entities.label: Water Withdrawn in High Stress Locations

properties.description: Volume of water withdrawn in locations with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress

entities.label: Water Consumed in High Stress Locations (Percentage)

properties.description: Water consumed in locations with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress as a percentage of the total water consumed
Calculates the percentage of water consumed from high or extremely high baseline water stress locations relative to total water consumed
properties.equation: (Water consumed in high stress locations / Total water consumed) × 100
input_variables: Water consumed in high stress locations

entities.label: Water Consumed in High Stress Locations

properties.description: Volume of water consumed in locations with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress
Composite metric combining total hazardous waste generated and the percentage recycled, calculated as weight of recycled hazardous waste divided by total weight of hazardous waste
properties.equation: (Weight of hazardous waste recycled / Total weight of hazardous waste) × 100
input_variables: Total weight of hazardous waste generated

entities.label: Total Weight of Hazardous Waste Generated

properties.description: Total weight of hazardous waste generated from manufacturing operations
Weight of hazardous waste generated from manufacturing operations that was recycled, reused, reclaimed or remanufactured
Calculates percentage of employees requiring work visa from count of visa-requiring employees divided by total employee count
properties.equation: (Number of employees requiring work visa / Total number of employees) × 100
input_variables: Number of employees requiring a work visa
